cont.entity_a: Provides bass control for 2 channel speaker systems. Adds significant bass with TRUbass feature. Improves sound clarity and bass in small stereo systems.
Volume control does not work; limited usefulness. Remote control does not adjust volume; no controls on the unit itself. Sound is clearer and crisper with reduced volume.

cont.entity_b: Includes S/PDIF fiber optic output for greater sound control.

cont.entity_a: Enhances sound quality for Bose 3 speaker system. Dialogue in surround sound movies is clearer. Enhances sound for movies, music, and gaming. Improves sound when connected to a dish receiver. Profound improvement to small library sound system.
cont.entity_b: Improves laptop sound significantly compared to onboard sound. Improves sound quality significantly for music and games. Clears sound on Logitech z-2300 speakers. Good sound quality without hugging resources.
Easy installation with clear and rich sound.
Not compatible with ExpressCard slots. Not recommended for low-end laptops due to performance issues.

cont.entity_a: Sound processor is not user-friendly; remote buttons are confusing.
cont.entity_b: Extends beyond laptop, making it difficult to travel with.

cont.entity_a: Surround mode somewhat improves sound but is not very spatial.

cont.entity_b: Static issues with notebook speakers; returned product.

cont.entity_a: Inexpensive with good performance as a stereo amplifier or pre-amp. Not worth more than $30. Good budget alternative to more expensive sound processors.

cont.entity_b: Causes blue screen when safely removed from Windows.
